Job Title: Senior Solution Architect

Location: Mason, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
The Solution Architect will provide technical Sales support and produce customer project requirements for customer sign-off and subsequently work with other Software and Controls HUB teams to ensure those requirements are understood and met.

The Solution Architect will carry out the duties described in this document while ensuring that they drive value, standardization, cost effectiveness and supportability of the HUBâ€™s software and controls offering across Swisslog WDS Americas for all its customers by creating a world-class software and controls organization with value generating products and services.

Responsibilities

Be a subject matter expert of the current Swisslog Software Product Suite functionality and its operationUnderstand what it would take to customize each functional areaHave a working knowledge of the current Swisslog Controls Product SuiteProvide technical Sales SupportConduct Swisslog Software demonstrationsLead Software and Controls presentationsProvide consultationAttend Design ReviewsAttend Risk ReviewsProvide Software and Controls hours estimatesProvide Software and Controls costingsLead Requirements Gathering Workshops with customerProduce Functional SpecificationsProduce Host Interface SpecificationsProduce and maintain material used for Sales support and requirements gatheringProvide requirement management support to other Software and Controls HUB teams

Essential

Application Requirements

Degree in engineering and/or computer scienceHave working knowledge of the Warehouse and Distribution business sectorHave at least five years experience in providing Software and/or Controls solutionsHave working knowledge of Warehouse Management SystemsHave working knowledge of Material Flow Control Systems

Desirable

Have working knowledge of PLC controls and control logicHave experience in defining, procuring, installing and maintaining IT Hardware, Controls Hardware and their supporting infrastructure

About Swisslog

Swisslog is shaping the #future of #intralogistics. As part of the KUKA Group, we are at the forefront of technology that is changing the world. Serving some of the biggest and most exciting brands across the globe, we're a team of 2,000 professionals and 50 nationalities, working together to transform intralogistics with smart minds and fresh perspectives. With our flexible, #robotic and #data-driven automated solutions, we are powering the supply chain and taking the industry forward. #JoinOurTeam and bring ideas to life!

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
